Wizard's Tower
Ritual
E4

effect number [effect_number]: 63

Remote Fort Construction:24 ?

(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster raises a tall impregnable stone tower from the ground in any friendly province within range. It is very difficult to break down the walls of this tower, but the administrative facilities are not to the same high standard.
